description.value:
This report records a procedure performed. Preferred document title: Denominator for Procedure Report Key encounter data:
The encounter type (inpatient or outpatient) is required. If the patient was an inpatient, a value for admission date is required. The facility id is required. Unit identifier and unit type are not reported.
Other dates and locations: The date of the procedure is recorded as effectiveTime in the Procedure Details Clinical Statement in a Procedure Report (V2).
Other notes: The procedure id is recorded in the Procedure Details Clinical Statement in a Procedure Report (V2). NHSN uses this to establish a link between Procedure and SSI Reports.

display.value: Revision associated with prior infection at index joint
